title: Meta Charged For Breaching EU Tech Rules Over Pay Or Consent Model
content: Meta Platforms was charged by EU antitrust regulators on Monday for failing to comply with landmark tech rules as they took aim at the US company's newly introduced pay or consent advertising model.
summary: Meta Platforms was charged by EU antitrust regulators on Monday for failing to comply with landmark tech rules as they took aim at the US company's newly introduced pay or consent advertising model.

title: No Food, Medicine: Gaza Hospital Chief's Israel Detention Ordeal
content: The head of the Gaza Strip's biggest hospital said on Monday after being freed from more than seven months of detention that he had been "tortured" by Israel.
summary: The head of the Gaza Strip's biggest hospital said on Monday after being freed from more than seven months of detention that he had been "tortured" by Israel.

title: Nepalese Spiritual Leader 'Buddha Boy' For 10 Years Over Child Sex Abuse
content: A Nepali court on Monday sentenced a man whose followers believe him to be a reincarnation of Buddha to 10 years in prison for child sexual abuse.
summary: A Nepali court on Monday sentenced a man whose followers believe him to be a reincarnation of Buddha to 10 years in prison for child sexual abuse.

title: Israel Issues New Southern Gaza Evacuation Warning
content: The Israeli army on Monday issued a new evacuation order for parts of Khan Yunis and Rafah in southern Gaza, with witnesses reporting that many were fleeing.
summary: The Israeli army on Monday issued a new evacuation order for parts of Khan Yunis and Rafah in southern Gaza, with witnesses reporting that many were fleeing.

title: Over 25 Injured Due To "Strong Turbulance" On Air Europa Flight: Report
content: An Air Europa Boeing plane made an emergency landing in Brazil Monday after several people were injured by "strong turbulence" on a flight from Madrid to Montevideo, the airline said.
summary: An Air Europa Boeing plane made an emergency landing in Brazil Monday after several people were injured by "strong turbulence" on a flight from Madrid to Montevideo, the airline said.

title: India, US To Establish Gandhi-King Development Foundation By October
content: The statement of intent was signed during the visit by US National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan to India last month.
summary: The statement of intent was signed during the visit by US National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan to India last month.

title: Category 4 Hurricane 'Beryl' Makes Landfall On Caribbean Island
content: Beryl, the first hurricane of the 2024 Atlantic season, slammed into the Caribbean island of Carriacou, which is part of Grenada, on Monday as a powerful Category 4 storm, the National Hurricane Center said.
summary: Beryl, the first hurricane of the 2024 Atlantic season, slammed into the Caribbean island of Carriacou, which is part of Grenada, on Monday as a powerful Category 4 storm, the National Hurricane Center said.

title: Trump Has Some Immunity From Prosecution As Ex President: US Supreme Court
content: The US Supreme Court ruled Monday that Donald Trump enjoys some immunity from prosecution as a former president, a ruling that will likely delay his trial for conspiring to overturn the 2020 election.
summary: The US Supreme Court ruled Monday that Donald Trump enjoys some immunity from prosecution as a former president, a ruling that will likely delay his trial for conspiring to overturn the 2020 election.

title: "Won't Let 90 Minutes Define 4 Years": Joe Biden's Wife On Debate Fiasco
content: She said, "We will continue to fight," and claimed that Mr Biden "will always do what's best for the country."
summary: She said, "We will continue to fight," and claimed that Mr Biden "will always do what's best for the country."

title: After Meta AI, Gemini AI Rolls Out In Google Messages
content: This development follows Google's recent announcement and the initial introduction of Gemini AI on other platforms like Gmail, according to GSM Arena.
summary: This development follows Google's recent announcement and the initial introduction of Gemini AI on other platforms like Gmail, according to GSM Arena.

title: US Woman Charged With Starving 2 Adopted Children Before Murdering Them
content: During a press conference, police said they have the forensic evidence to support allegations of torture, starvation, and isolation.
summary: During a press conference, police said they have the forensic evidence to support allegations of torture, starvation, and isolation.

title: US Police Shoot And Kill 13-Year-Old Who Wielded Replica Gun
content: Nyah Mway produced what appeared to be a handgun when the police attempted to frisk him.
summary: Nyah Mway produced what appeared to be a handgun when the police attempted to frisk him.

title: "Time For Joe To Go": Ex White House Photographer Urges Biden To Drop Out
content: He claimed that White House aides have known for months that Joe Biden's mental health has been deteriorating but they covered it up ahead of the debate.

title: Explained: Is AI Going to Change The Way We Invest In Stock Markets?
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has made inroads on multiple fronts in our lives. And investing in stock markets is the latest one set to be transformed by advancements in AI.
summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has made inroads on multiple fronts in our lives. And investing in stock markets is the latest one set to be transformed by advancements in AI.

title: Opinion: Why Europe Is Jittery Over A Possible Return Of Trump
content: In Europe, Biden's poor showing, which dramatically increased Trump's chances of being re-elected, has stirred up a lot of anxiety about what a second Trump term could mean for Europe's security and Ukraine's future.
summary: In Europe, Biden's poor showing, which dramatically increased Trump's chances of being re-elected, has stirred up a lot of anxiety about what a second Trump term could mean for Europe's security and Ukraine's future.

title: Indian-Origin Woman, 24, Dies On Qantas Flight From Melbourne To New Delhi
content: The incident happened on June 20 when 24-year-old Manpreet Kaur boarded the aircraft ready to fly from Melbourne to Delhi.
summary: The incident happened on June 20 when 24-year-old Manpreet Kaur boarded the aircraft ready to fly from Melbourne to Delhi.

title: Gaza Hospital Chief Among Palestinians Prisoners Freed By Israel
content: Israel released the head of Gaza's biggest hospital, who had been detained for more than seven months, among dozens of Palestinian prisoners returned Monday to the besieged territory for treatment.
summary: Israel released the head of Gaza's biggest hospital, who had been detained for more than seven months, among dozens of Palestinian prisoners returned Monday to the besieged territory for treatment.

title: Only Conservatives Can Give Tough Fight To Labour Party: Rishi Sunak
content: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak will on Monday say only his Conservatives can counter a Labour-led government and that a vote for Nigel Farage's right-wing Reform UK would hamper any chance of his party forming a strong opposition.
summary: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak will on Monday say only his Conservatives can counter a Labour-led government and that a vote for Nigel Farage's right-wing Reform UK would hamper any chance of his party forming a strong opposition.

title: Indian-Origin Woman, Charged In Singapore, Allowed To Visit Kerala
content: A court in Singapore on Monday allowed an Indian-origin Singaporean woman, who was charged with organising a pro-Palestine procession without a permit, to leave the country to visit her grandparents in Kerala.
summary: A court in Singapore on Monday allowed an Indian-origin Singaporean woman, who was charged with organising a pro-Palestine procession without a permit, to leave the country to visit her grandparents in Kerala.

title: UK Political Crisis: Why The Country Has Seen 3 Prime Ministers In 3 Years
content: The United Kingdom will vote in the general election on July 4. A resurgent Labour Party, under the leadership of Keir Starmer, is predicted to win a majority in the House of Commons after a 14-year rule of the Conservative Party.
summary: The United Kingdom will vote in the general election on July 4. A resurgent Labour Party, under the leadership of Keir Starmer, is predicted to win a majority in the House of Commons after a 14-year rule of the Conservative Party.
